{{c|virtual void '''OnDrop''' (Actor ''dropper'')}}
==Usage== A [[ZScript virtual functions|virtual function]] used by the {{class|Inventory}} class. Normally, called automatically when the item is dropped, at the end of {{c|[[DropInventory_(ZScript)|DropInventory]]}}, after all of that function's code has executed.
In the base {{class|Inventory}} class this function is empty and doesn't do anything.
===Parameters=== *{{c|Actor '''dropper'''}} :A pointer to the actor which dropped the item.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
==See also== * [[DropInventory (ZScript)]] * [[Inventory virtual functions]]
